name: abcify
description: sort object literals, object destructuring, react attributes, and flow type by key

scripts.test1: ./abcify --cases --imports --destructures --objects --shapes --enums --attributes example/input.js > example/tested.js && diff example/tested.js example/expected.js && rm example/tested.js
scripts.test: npm run test1 && npm run test2

author: Timothy Shiu <timoweave@gmail.com>
